title: Crypto Miners Still Selling Their Bitcoin as Reward Halving Looms, Blockchain Data Show
description: The number of bitcoin held in wallets tied to miners has dropped to the lowest since mid-2021.

title: Price speculators sees highest single-day loss of $774 million YTD amid Bitcoin upward trajectory
description:

title: U.S. transfers $1B seized Bitcoin from Bitfinex hack to unknown addresses
description: Nearly $1 billion in Bitcoin, previously confiscated by the U.S. government from the Bitfinex hack case, has been moved to unknown addresses in a swift series of transactions. This involves two wallets specifically identified as containing funds from the Bitfinex heist. The transactions unfolded in four separate moves over less than two hours. Details of […]

title: Calls for FTX founder’s  Mercy echo in courtroom
description: In a surprising twist of events, a chorus of appeals has inundated the courtroom, urging leniency in the sentencing of FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried. Facing a possible 115-year prison term after being found guilty of seven criminal charges, including fraud and conspiracy, Bankman-Fried’s defense team and family and friends fervently advocate for a reduced sentence […]

title: Bitcoin ETFs Surge: Daily Volumes Hit Record $6 Billion Amidst Rising Investor Demand – BTC Eyes $69,000
description: Bitcoin ETFs have seen record-breaking daily trading volumes, reaching $6 billion, indicating a robust demand from investors.
